caption.p: Differential expression gene analysis. BDNF expression between HD and non-dementia controls ( A). Distribution of DEGs in the HD / control ( B) and BDNF-low / high group ( C): blue represents down-regulated and red indicates up-regulated. Heatmap of the top 25 down-regulated and up-regulated genes ( D). HD: Huntingtonâ€™s disease, DEGs: differential expression genes.
